The Emerald Leaf

Santa Barbara Home and Plant Care Services

Travel without the worry of leaving your home unattended or the stress of leaving your plants behind.

Hello, 👋 I'm Angela. I offer interior and exterior plant watering services while you are out of town. Below is a general list of services offered. Each household is unique, so please reach out if there are specifics you are needing.

Services

  • Plant Watering

    Inside plants, outside plants, we take care fo them ALL

  • Mail and Package Gathering

    We'll put keep up with your mail so it doesn't get soaked in the spring or left out during the summer

  • Point of Contact

    Need me to coordinate with cleaners, gardeners, or other folks for service appointments? I've got your back.

  • Provide Lamps On Timers

    Keep the lights on, even when you're not home.
